div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1739 Gori environs, c. 65 km. NW of Tiflis, in anc. Iberia, 1853 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C.? (M) Contents: 30+ AR Parthia: dr. ("early empire") Disposition: Leningrad some (merged with main collection) † Bartholomaci, Lettres numismatiques et archeologi- ques, relatives à la Transcaucasie (St. Peters- burg, 1859), p. 23 Vasmer, ZfN 1926, p. 278 Pakhomov II, no. 328 Zograph, "Nakhodky," no. 80
